para: The bitmap (BMP) should be 24x24 (or smaller) and can be in RGB-colors (24- and 32-bit) or 8-bit indexed color format.

If you're starting from images in another format, you may need to use another tool like Gimp or ImageMagick's convert to get the imaga into oen of the above formats to avoid errors about "Unsupported color depth".
A color value of 0xFF00FF (blue=255, green=0, red=255), also called "Magenta", can be used for transparent areas.
